io.spine.client

Class ActorRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.ActorRequestFactory

  • public class ActorRequestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for the various requests fired from the client-side by an actor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ActorRequestFactory.Builder
      A builder for ActorRequestFactory.

      CommandFactory command()
      Creates an instance of CommandFactory based on configuration of this ActorRequestFactory instance.
      protected io.spine.core.CommandContext createCommandContext() 
      io.spine.core.UserId getActor()
      Obtains the ID of the user on behalf of whom the requests are created.
      @Nullable io.spine.core.TenantId getTenantId()
      Obtains the ID of the tenant to which the actor belongs, or null for single-tenant execution context.
      io.spine.time.ZoneId getZoneId()
      Obtains the ID of the time zone in which the actor works.
      io.spine.time.ZoneOffset getZoneOffset()
      Obtains the offset of the time zone in which the actor works.

      Creates a builder for a new request factory.

      Creates a copy of this factory placed at new time zone with the passed offset and ID.

      Creates an instance of TopicFactory based on configuration of this ActorRequestFactory instance.

      • switchTimeZone

        public ActorRequestFactory switchTimeZone(io.spine.time.ZoneOffset zoneOffset,
                                          io.spine.time.ZoneId zoneId)
        Creates a copy of this factory placed at new time zone with the passed offset and ID.

        Use this method for obtaining new request factory as the user moves to a new location.

        Parameters:
        zoneOffset - the offset of the new time zone
        zoneId - the ID of the new time zone
        Returns:
        new factory at the new time zone

      • switchTimeZone

        public ActorRequestFactory switchTimeZone(io.spine.time.ZoneId zoneId)
        Creates a copy of this factory placed at new time zone with the passed ID.

        The zone offset is calculated using the current time.

        Parameters:
        zoneId - the ID of the new time zone
        Returns:
        new factory at the new time zone
